wikipedia_page.main:
George Henry Rogerson (13 March 1896 – 29 May 1961) was an English cricketer.  Born at Monks Coppenhall, Cheshire, he made twelve appearances in first-class cricket.
Having played for the Lancashire Second XI since 1921, Rogerson made his first-class cricket debut for Lancashire in 1923 against Oxford University at Oxford. He made eleven further appearances in first-class cricket in 1922, playing his final match for Lancashire in the County Championship against Hampshire. He scored a total of 340 runs in his twelve matches, with a high score of 47 not out and a batting average of 17.89.He died at Crewe, Cheshire on 29 May 1961.
